attributes.action: Remove the Peerage and Title given to Paul White (Lord Hanningfield)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We request the Prime Minister to remove the Peerage and Title given to Paul White (Lord Hanningfield)in light of charges he faces for serious criminal offences.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the monarch.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
